name: Strava Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Strava events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Strava Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Strava events occur

object.name: object
object.natural_language_description: 参数名: Object | 默认值: *

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 默认值: *

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the webhook-data only contain the Object ID. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default the webhook-data only contain the Object ID. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically. | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: deleteIfExist (值: None) - Strava allows just one subscription at all times. If you want to delete the current subscription to make room for a new subscription with the current parameters, set this parameter to true. Keep in mind this is a destructive operation.
